Description of incident: Medical files were found by a former customer of a Dr. Pramod Raval, who was indicted in a Medicare home health care fraud scheme. Boxes of full files were dumped outside with massive amounts of patient data still intact.The medical files included files that contained names, Social Security numbers, X-rays, blood types and addresses.The local police were notified and the files were scheduled to be shredded.More Information: http://www.clickondetroit.com/news/medical-files-found-dumped-in-oak-par...
